title: How is pes for mca?
content: I saw someone saying that only 8 students got placed out of 300. Is that really true??I saw a youtube video where the guy was praising pes and saying its good for mca and you do get placed there,is it all false? Is the placement scenario that bad

comments.body:
Tbh the curriculum is good like it's all updated syllabus and unlike writing on paper they actually ask you to code.
As far as placement it's about 60-70% that too depending on the market. I mean good companies do come here.
how did the placement go for the this year?
Bro what was the average package and highest package you guys got? I'm getting very mixed reviews on the placements
